wikitext.*:
'''ÁNAD''' and '''ANDA''' are [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|roots]] related to longness.<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 348</ref>

*[[Primitive Quendian]]: ''andā'' ("long")
**[[Quenya]]: ''[[anda]]''; ''[[andave]]''
**[[Noldorin]] ([[Sindarin]]): ''[[and]]''
